title: Metal boots

properties.name: description
properties.value: Metal boots are armour pieces in RuneScape that are worn in the footwear slot. They are protective footwear that are made out of armour metals and cannot be made with the Smithing skill. They offer more protection than most standard boots with the expense of extra weight. All metal boots (except White boots and Bandos boots) are dropped by Slayer monsters.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Metal boots
 This article or section is incomplete and could do with improvement.
Reason: Needs to include all boots (see Template:Boots) or at the very least the new melee ones
You can discuss this issue on the talk page or edit this article to improve it.

Metal boots are armour pieces in RuneScape that are worn in the footwear slot. They are protective footwear that are made out of armour metals and cannot be made with the Smithing skill. They offer more protection than most standard boots with the expense of extra weight. All metal boots (except White boots and Bandos boots) are dropped by Slayer monsters.

They come in the following types: Bronze, Iron, Steel, Black, Mithril, Adamant, Rune, and Dragon. Also, there are white boots and Bandos boots.
